mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO STORE (LASTUPDATE, TITLE, SUBDIVISION,IMAGE,GRADE,REVIEWCOUNT,`VIEW`,ID) VALUES (#{lastUpdate},#{title},#{subdivision},#{image},#{grade},#{reviewCount},#{view},#{id})

INSERT IGNORE INTO STORETABLE (ADDRESS, PHONENUMBER, FOODTYPE, PRICERANGE, PARKING, TIME, LASTORDER, WEBSITE, MENU, RESTDAY,TITLE,URL) VALUES (#{address},#{phoneNumber},#{foodType},#{priceRange}, #{parking},#{time},#{lastOrder} ,#{website},#{menu}, #{restDay},#{title},#{url})
